title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements by collaborating with stakeholders and conducting research on existing smart city security systems.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the integration of various city infrastructure components (e.g., surveillance cameras, traffic management systems, emergency response systems), data flows, communication protocols, and security protocols. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, performance requirements, and disaster recovery mechanisms. Define the high-level components, their interactions, and the data models. Ensure adherence to industry standards and best practices for security, privacy, and data protection. Clarify the design choices made and provide rationale for them. Address any potential edge cases and discuss mitigation strategies.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store and manage data from various city infrastructure components and security systems.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend systems for data processing, integration, and communication between different components of the smart city security network.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interfaces and dashboards for monitoring, controlling, and managing the smart city security network.

title: Security and Compliance (Revised)
description: Implement robust security measures, including encryption methods, secure data storage solutions, regular vulnerability assessments, and compliance with relevant regulations and industry best practices. This task will also include a detailed Data Protection Policy, incident response plan, and regular security audits.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components of the system and perform comprehensive testing, including functional, performance, and security testing.

title: Deployment and Operations
description: Plan and implement the deployment strategy, set up monitoring and logging systems, and establish operational procedures for the smart city security network.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user manuals, technical documentation, and training materials for end-users and administrators.
